title: The Buffalo Hunt
description: The Buffalo Hunt is about a Native American boy who is going on his first buffalo hunt with the men of his tribe. This narrative describes the preparation for the hunt, the events of the hunt, and its meaning for Wind-in-the-Treetops's family. Illustrations support the text.
